topics.body:
And it's over.

I recorded the final hour demo so people can see how it played. If it gets taken down by Nintendo I don't give a crap, I had fun playing it.

Also, I GOT A QUAD. I'm ready to go MLG in Splatoon now. I've got Charge Cancelling almost down, and I've discovered Cone Jumping. I'm going top of the leaderboards every game and my win/loss ratio is like 58/2.

4v4 me m8s

"@Too_Offensive":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/554e6bcc636872220f850200#post_554e6bcc636872220f850200
Quad as in I got 4 kills in quick succession, basically I eliminated their entire team at once

Charge Cancelling is when you go into squid mode to block and survive a shot from the charge weapon

And quadruple digit scores are also great :D
